page.shortlink: api objects session object set sql credentials method
page.description: Sets the SQL username and password used for SQL connections.
page.prototype: Context.Session.SetSQLCredentials as L (Username as C, Password as C)

argument.name: Username as C
argument.description: The value of the SQL username.

argument.name: Password as C
argument.description: The value of the SQL password.

page.discussion: Context.Session.SetSQLCredentials() sets the SQL username and password used for SQL connections. Check *[link:Context.Session.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
